resources.string: What\'s your choice of milk? Would you like whip cream?

What is your choice of size? 
Short: 236 mL 
Tall: 354mL 
Grande: 473mL 
Venti: 591mL 
(Solo, Doppio, Triple, Quad in this app are considered Espresso equivalents of Short, Tall, Grande, and Venti, respectively)
Let\'s see what Starbucks drink is for you!
What\'s your choice of calories? (unit = kcal)
What is your ideal range of total fat (g) and cholesterol (mg) ?
What is your ideal range of total carbohydrates (g) and added sugar (g)?
Go to Homepage and start over (cannot be undone)
